title: Smart Data Models - AnalogLimitSet
description: Adapted from CIM data models. An AnalogLimitSet specifies a set of Limits that are associated with an Analog measurement.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AnalogLimitSet

Limits.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The set of limits. Default: 'list'

Measurements.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A measurement may have zero or more limit ranges defined for it. Default: 'list'
